bt::Когда вдохновленный умы приходить вм: When inspired minds come together, miracles happen.
bt::Группа компаний JCBLявляется маяком: The JCBL Group is a beacon of passion and inspiration. Founded in 1989, we have turned a bold vision into a dynamic reality that positively impacts the lives of more than a billion people around the world.
bt::Начав с первых шагов в сфере мобильн: From its pioneering roots in mobility solutions, the Group has today established a strong presence in key sectors including mobile applications, defense and aerospace, railway, bus and industrial parts and components, agriculture and instrumentation and control.
bt::Детали и компоненты для железных дор: Parts and Components for Railways, Uses and Industries
bt::Мы гордимся своим превосходством в п: We take pride in our manufacturing excellence through our modern and well-integrated plants located in the northern and southern parts of the country. We use the latest advanced technology and machines.
bt::На каждом этапе разработки продукта: At every stage of product development - design, engineering, production and assembly - quality checks are rigorously carried out by monitoring performance, efficiency and, above all, safety.
bt::JCBL остается на шаг впереди благода: JCBL remains one step ahead through continuous investment in research and development, cutting-edge technology and strategic collaborations with global market leaders, design houses and engineering firms. Our strength lies in bringing together diverse, interdisciplinary teams that work in real time to solve complex engineering problems and deliver world-class, customized solutions.
bt::Мы всегда стремимся к полному удовле: We always strive for the complete satisfaction of our customers, partners and society as a whole through continuous improvement of our quality management system and the collective efforts of all our employees.
bt::Уже более 35 лет группа JCBL пользуе: For over 35 years, JCBL Group has been trusted in the industry by providing advanced defense solutions for a variety of applications.
bt::Руководствуясь нашей миссией по прое: Driven by our mission to design, manufacture, service and modernize strategic and tactical defense equipment, armored vehicles and aerospace technologies, we have founded Airbornics Defense & Space Private Limited. Today, ADSL is a leading force in the defense and aerospace industries, specializing in the design, production, maintenance and modernization of aerospace systems, strategic defense platforms and armored vehicles. ADSL meets the highest industry standards and is certified to ISO 9001:2015, IATF 16949:2016, ISO/IEC 27001:2013, CMMI Level 3 and AS 9100D for Aerospace Quality Management System standards, ensuring excellence in all areas. Our mission is to provide next-generation solutions that enhance the accuracy, resilience and operational excellence of the Armed Forces.
bt::В ADSL мы не просто производимзащита: At ADSL, we don't just make security and aerospace solutions—we're designing the future of security and aerospace.

bt::APS— это передовые оборонные техноло: APS are advanced defense technologies designed to detect, intercept and neutralize incoming threats such as projectiles, missiles and anti-tank guided missiles. These systems enhance the survivability of armored vehicles and protect on-board personnel using a combination of detection, destruction and interception techniques.
bt::Радарная подсистема – для обнаружени: Radar subsystem – for detecting and identifying threats.
bt::Подсистема помех – для операций мягк: Jamming subsystem - for soft destruction operations
bt::Подсистема противодействия/пусковой: Countermeasures/launcher subsystem – for hard kill operations.
bt::Системы управления огнем - для балли: Fire control systems - for ballistic algorithms.
bt::В ответ на растущую угрозу, которую: In response to the growing threat that hostile drones pose to critical infrastructure and national security, ADSL has developed advanced multi-layered counter-drone solutions designed to quickly detect, accurately track and reliably neutralize unauthorized aerial threats.
bt::Это отечественное решение объединяет: This indigenous solution integrates advanced radar technologies, radio jamming, electro-optical/infrared (EO/IR) surveillance, interceptor drones and hard kill mechanisms to provide comprehensive protection of strategic assets, border areas and sensitive areas. ADSL offers the following wide range of anti-drone solutions.
bt::Компактная, портативная, переносимая: Compact, portable, one-person-carryable system suitable for field use.
bt::Быстрая нейтрализация несанкциониров: Quickly neutralize unauthorized or hostile drones.
bt::Перехватывайте и выводите из строя д: Intercept and disable drones at short and medium ranges without physical destruction.
bt::Эффективное решение в тактических оп: An effective solution in tactical operations, border protection and VIP security.
bt::Многодиапазонные радиочастотные поме: Multi-band radio frequency interference with frequencies 400 MHz - 2.4 GHz, in six channels.
bt::Быстрое развертывание и ввод в экспл: Rapid deployment and commissioning within seconds.
bt::Форм-фактор для стрельбы с плеча или: Form factor for shoulder-fired or trigger-action rifles.
bt::Рабочая дальность обнаружения до 7 к: Working range of detection is up to 7 km and jamming up to 3 km (line of sight).
bt::Обновляемая библиотека на основе угр: Updated threat-based library to detect all types of drones.
bt::Обнаруживайте более 10 дронов одновр: Detect more than 10 drones at the same time.
bt::Отключает прием GPS/ГЛОНАСС/Galileo: Disables GPS/GLONASS/Galileo reception by target drones, causing disorientation or automatic landing.
bt::Встроенный диагностический дисплей и: Built-in diagnostic display or LED indicators for system status and battery status.
bt::Вес до 6 кг для использования одним: Weight up to 6 kg for use by one operator
bt::Система MPADS представляет собой ком: The MPADS system is a combination of two subsystems:
bt::Обнаружение радиочастотных сигналов: 360° RF detection with signal classification (2.4 GHz, 5.8 GHz, GNSS, C2 custom channels)
bt::EO/IR-камера (опция) для визуального: EO/IR camera (optional) for visual confirmation and passive tracking
bt::Дальность обнаружения: до 7 км в зав: Detection range: up to 7 km depending on terrain and drone size
bt::Обнаружьте дронов менее чем за 10сек: Detect drones in less than 10 seconds.
bt::НизкийМенять(размер, вес и мощность): Low change(size, weight and power) with silent operation
bt::Оповещения в режиме реального времен: Real-time alerts via audio, visual and vibration feedback on a wearable or mobile display.
bt::Зашифрованная связь с блоком помех и: Encrypted communications with the jammer and central command if necessary.
bt::Многодиапазонное глушениенапример.GN: Multi-band jamming e.g. GNSS, 2.4 GHz, 5.8 GHz and custom RF bands.
bt::Система поддерживает глушениефуг час: The system supports jamming frequency ranges from 400 MHz to 2.4 GHz simultaneously in 3-6 channels.
bt::Направленная антенна с высоким коэфф: High gain directional antenna for precise target engagement
bt::Эффективная дальность постановки пом: Effective jamming range up to 1.5 - 2 km (LoS)
bt::Работа по триггеру с защитной блокир: Trigger operation with safety lock and mode switch (interrupt/shutdown)
bt::Питание от аккумулятора (с возможнос: Battery powered (field replaceable), operating time >1 hour.
bt::Прочный для использования одним чело: Durable for one person use in combat conditions.
bt::Усовершенствованное решение перехват: An advanced drone-mounted interception solution designed to capture enemy drones intact using a network shooting mechanism.
bt::Развертывание сети для опутывания, в: Deploying a net to entangle, disable, or tow a target drone to safety.
bt::Перехватывайте и выводите из строя д: Intercept and disable drones within visual range without physically destroying them.
bt::Позволяет безопасно возвращать враже: Allows the safe recovery of enemy UAVs for forensic analysis, data extraction or disposal.
bt::Многороторный БПЛА сЭО/ИК-камера для: Multi-rotor UAV SEO/IR camera for visual target detection power and network launch system.
bt::Связь на частоте 2,4 ГГц/5,8 ГГц, ши: Communication at 2.4 GHz/5.8 GHz frequency, AES-256 encryption, data transmission channel at a distance of 4–5 km.
bt::Автономное обнаружение и сопровожден: Autonomous detection and tracking of targets using artificial intelligence.
bt::Дальность действия дрона до 2-3 км (: The drone's range is up to 2-3 km (line of sight).
bt::Сетка для стрельбы, чтобы сбить дрон: A shooting net to shoot down a drone by entangling the rotors.
bt::Эффективная дальность: 10–30 метров: Effective range: 10-30 meters from the target drone.
bt::Захват и буксировка дрона-мишени на: Capture and tow the target drone to the base.
bt::Новейшая мобильная платформа, предна: The latest mobile platform designed to detect, track and neutralize unmanned aerial vehicles (UAVs) and drones.
bt::Системы интегрированы с радаром, при: The systems are integrated with radar, targeting, electronic warfare and directed energy weapons to provide comprehensive defense against drone threats.
bt::Подходит для быстрого развертывания: Suitable for rapid deployment to airports, field operations, and civilian populations to protect against potential drone attacks.
bt::Визуальная идентификация и автоматич: Visual identification and automatic tracking of drone threats.
bt::Обнаруживает частоты связи дронов (2: Detects drone communication frequencies (2.4 GHz/5.8 GHz)
bt::Глушит GNSS и радиочастотные связи,: Jams GNSS and RF communications to disable drone control
bt::Нарушается связь дрона с оператором: The connection between the drone and the operator is disrupted
bt::Нейтрализация враждебных дронов с по: Neutralize hostile drones using kinetic disturbances.
bt::Net-Gun Launcher или кинетическое уб: Net-Gun Launcher or kinetic kill with minimal collateral damage.
bt::Централизованная обработка и координ: Centralized processing and coordination of data on threats and system actions.
bt::Комплексный, многоуровневыйзащитареш: Comprehensive, multi-layered security solutions designed to ensure the security of sensitive facilities such as air bases and border posts.
bt::Электрический умный силовой забор-Ос: Electric Smart Power Fence - Equipped with a vibration detector for entry-level security.
bt::Инфракрасные и тепловизионные камеры: High Definition Infrared and Thermal Cameras - Integrated with built-in video analytics for real-time intrusion detection.
bt::Системы обнаружения подземной вибрац: Underground Vibration Detection Systems - Use underground fiber optic cables to identify threats, including when digging tunnels.
bt::Радары-Интегрирован с входами радара: Radars - Integrated with radar and sensor inputs to automatically detect and track targets in challenging terrain and weather conditions.
bt::Командный центр управления-Используе: Command and Control Center - Uses AI-based analytics to filter out false alarms and provides real-time tracking of intruders using 3D mapping and coordinates rapid response efforts.
bt::Специализированные дроны наблюдения-: Dedicated Surveillance Drones - Provide aerial monitoring and improve situational awareness in real time.
bt::Платформа&Парашютная система для дес: Platform&Parachute Airdrop System for C130 Cargo Aircraft
bt::Предназначен для десантирования техн: Designed for landing equipment weighing up to 20 tons from a C130 cargo aircraft.
bt::Для паллетирования и крепления боево: For palletizing and securing military equipment and cargo
bt::Обеспечивает крепление парашютной си: Provides attachment for the parachute system.
bt::Извлекает и замедляет платформу с по: Retrieves and decelerates the payload platform during release from the aircraft.
bt::Страны, имеющие парк самолетов C130:: Countries with a fleet of C130 aircraft:
bt::США, Австралия, Канада, Индия, Итали: USA, Australia, Canada, India, Italy, UK, Bahrain, Bangladesh, Denmark, France, Germany, Iraq, Israel, South Korea, Kuwait, Norway, Oman, Qatar, Saudi Arabia, Tunisia, New Zealand, Indonesia, Philippines and Egypt.
bt::Сбрасывание военно-морских грузов -: Naval cargo drop is the delivery of supplies to naval ships at sea using parachutes or low-altitude vehicles to allow rapid resupply during operations, humanitarian missions, or when docking is not possible.
bt::Тормозной парашют иВоенный боевой па: Braking parachute and military combat parachute
bt::Тормозные парашютыТакже известные ка: Braking parachutesAlso known as drogue parachutes or drogue parachutes, are small parachutes that are used to quickly reduce the speed of an object. They are commonly used in aviation, space and motorsports where conventional braking systems are insufficient or impossible.
bt::Как партнер по развитию и производст: As Development and Manufacturing Partner (DCPP), we have received a prototype order for 15 units. After successful testing, we will provide Technology Transfer (ToT) for future orders.
bt::MCPS (парашютная система для перенос: MCPS (Manual Carrying Parachute System) is a specialized military parachute designed for the safe transfer of fully equipped personnel from aircraft. It provides controlled descent, maneuverability and safe landing in challenging environments such as forests, bodies of water and high altitudes.
bt::MCPS позволяет спецназу использовать: MCPS allows special forces to use equipment using techniques such as HAHO, HAMO and HALO.
bt::Он соответствует международным станд: It meets international standards and complies with PIA testing guidelines.
bt::Спроектированный, разработанный и по: Designed, developed and supplied by ADRDE, HPL is used for loading and unloading heavy cargo from aircraft. It also makes it easier to transport cargo from the air port to the aircraft runway.
